variable.name: culture_number
variable.description: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc. culture taken for a particular subject.

variable.name: case_cont
variable.comment: "Cases" are subjects with chronic Pseudomonas aeruginosa (P.a.); "Controls" are subjects who never showed P.a. positive cultures in consecutive quarters, or only late in life.

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age of subject at culture, rounded to nearest year.

variable.name: PaPos
variable.value: Positive for Pseudomonas in the age range defined by the current age and previous age; previous age is birth for the first observation.
